definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: draw, drag (NH id.; Aram. [[מְשַׁח]] (rare) be extended, also conduct, take, Syr. m4ak is be dry, shrivelled (of fruit., etc.); Eth. masaka: bend (the bow); Ar. masaka grasp and hold I. Frey; IV. Frey Lane; cf. also As. masûku, skin (perh. also march Dl:HWB 431), Ar. maskun id., Aram. me4ko0, [[מַשְׁכָּא]] id.);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. ´[[מ]] 1Ki 22:34 + 2 t., [[וּמָשַׁח]] consec. Job 24:22; 3 fs. [[מָֽשְׁכָה]] De 21:3, etc.; Impf. [[יִמְשׁוֹח]] Job 21:33; [[וַיִּמְשׁׂח]] Ju Jdg 20:37; 2 ms. sf. [[תִּמְשְׁכֵנִי]] Ps 28:3; 1 S. sf. [[אֶמְשְׁכֵם]] Ho 11:4, etc.; Imv. [[מְשׁׂח]] Ps 36:11, sf. [[מָשְׁכֵנִי]] Ct So 1:4; mpl. [[מִשְׁכוּ]] Ex 12:21, [[מָשְׁכוּ]] Ez Eze 32:20; Inf. cstr. [[מְשׁׂח]] Ex 19:13, Jos 6:5, [[לִמְשׁוֹח]] Ec 2:3; Pt. [[משֵׁח]] Am 9:13, Ps 109:12; pl. [[משְׁכִים]] Ju Jdg 5:14; cstr. [[משְׁכֵי]] Is 5:18, Is 66:19; —

draw and lift out of ([[מִן]]), c. acc. pers., [[וַיִּמְשְׁכוּ וַיַּעֲלוּ אֶת־יוֹסֵף מִן הַבּוֹר]] Ge 37:28 (E), so Jeremiah (+ [[בַּחֲבָלִים]], [[ב]] instr.) Je 38:13; cf. [[תִּמְשׁׂח לִוְיׇתָן בְּחַכָּה]] Job 40:25; draw, drag along [[משְׁכֵי עָוֹן בְּחַבְלֵי הֵשָּׁוְא]] Is 5:18 (fig.); [[בְּמָשְׁכוֹ]] [[בְּרִשְׁתּוֹ]] Ps 10:9 (fig. of wicked catching and dragging the poor); draw, lead along (with hostile purpose) c. acc. pers. Ju Jdg 4:7 (subj. ´[[י]]; + [[אֶל־]] pers. et rei); lead or drag off (to doom, subj. ´[[י]]) Ps 28:3 (cf. Ps 26:9); similarly, or = draw down to death, ´[[מָשְׁכוּ אוֹתָהּ וגו]] Ez Eze 32:20 (si vera l.; ref. to fall of Egypt), but rd. perh. a form of [[שׁכב]] for [[משׁכו]], LXX Co Berthol, cf. Sm.; abs., subj. heifer, [[מָֽשְׁכָה בְּעוֹל]] De 21:3 ([[ב]] instr.); draw, lead (in love), (fig., subj. ´[[י]]) [[בְּחַבְלֵי אָדָם אֶמְשְׁכֵם]] Ho 11:4, cf. Je 31:3 (al. as
draw the bow, [[בַּקֶּשֶׁת]] ´[[מ]] 1Ki 22:34 = 2Ch 18:33, but ´[[משְׁכֵי ק]] Is 66:19 (where text dub., LXX Mosox kai\ ei)v (qWbel), so Lo Sta:Javan 8 Du Che:Hpt,—not Gr Che:Comm Di).

proceed, march (cf. Germ. ziehen) [[וּמָשַׁכְתָּ֫]] [[בְּהַר תָּבוֹר]] Ju Jdg 4:6 cf. Jdg 20:37 (abs.), Job 21:33 ([[אַחֲרָיו]]); so also (perh.) Ex 12:21 proceed (i.e. forthwith), and take you a sheep; and prob. [[משְׁכִים בְּשֵׁבֶט]] Ju Jdg 5:14 those marching with the staff, etc. (most under
draw out a sound, give a sound, [[בִּמְשׁׂח הַיּׁבֵל]] Ex 19:13 (E) when the ram ('s horn) sounds, [[בְּקֶרֶן]] ´[[הַיּׁבֵל בִּמ]] Jos 6:5 (JE).

draw out, prolong, continue, [[מְשׁׂח חַסְדְּ ְלְיׁדְעֶיְ]] Ps 36:10 prolong, continue thy kindness to them that know thee; [[אַל־יְהִי לוֹ משֵׁח חֶסֶד]] Ps 109:12; (so poss. [[מְשַׁכְתִּי ְחָָסֶד]] Je 31:3 I have prolonged kindness to thee, cf. Ryle Ne 9:30; al. as

supr.); cf. [[עֲלֶיהֶם שָׁנִים]] ´[[וַתִּמ]] [[רַבּוֹת]] Ne 9:30 ([[חֶסֶד]] omitted); [[אַפְּ ְלְדׂר וׇדׂר]] ´[[תִּמ]] Ps 85:6 (‖[[הַלְעוֹלָם תֶּאֱנַף בָּנוּ]]); [[אַבִּירִים בְּכׂחוֹ]] ´[[וּמ]] Job 24:22 i.e. he (God) prolongeth the life of the mighty (Du draggeth them off, as Ps 28:3
supr.,—reading also [[אׂבְּדִים]] for ´[[אַבּ]] with LXX Bi); cf.

definitions.title: Niph. 6.
definitions.body: trail seed (draw along in sowing) Am 9:13 (opp. [[דָּׂרֵח עֲנׇבִים]]; cf. [[מֶשֶׁח]] infr.)

(late) cheer (draw, attract, gratify) [[בַּיַּיִן]] ´[[מ]] [[אֶת־בְּשָׂרִי]] Ec 2:3, —so De (who cites NH, Chag:14 a) Now Wild.—[[מָשַׁךְ יׇדוֹ אֶת־לּֽחֲחִים]] Ho 7:5 is difficult, LXX AV RV he stretcheth out his hand with, maketh common cause with, is hardly poss., text prob. corrupt We Now.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 mpl. [[לאׁ יִמָּשֵָׁכוּ]] Is 13:22 they shall not be prolonged (days of Babylon); 3 fs. [[לאׁ תִּמָּשֵׁח]] Ez Eze 12:25, Eze 12:28 it shall not be postponed.

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pt. long drawn out: [[מְמֻשָּׁח]] Is 18:2, Is 18:7 of persons, = tall; [[תּׂחֶלֶת מְמֻשָּׁכָה]] Pr 13:12 hope postponed, deferred.
